title: Aromas Cafe Font
content:
What is this font?   
   
This is what I found so far   
Carlos

 [‹ (x) Joseph and The Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat - ITC Serif Gothic (warped) {Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071114011926/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6476 "Go to previous forum topic") [Airplane nose art font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071114011926/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6465 "Go to next forum topic")
author: john_g

comments.content: Cameron, can you give some background about the sample. About when was this created, where. Do you have any more samples

I'm going to guess that this is not computer type, because that R doesn't look like anything I've seen in the Art Deco fonts I know (of course this just might be one I don't know), but I'm interested to hear Cameron's answer too. I wish we could get people to give us more background on samples they scan.   
   
There are some other styles that I consider in this mode that you can see in [Part 6 of the Bauhaus-style Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20071114011926/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces6.html).
